channel.title: deadface on d3bo
channel.description: Recent content in deadface on d3bo

item.title: Echo Chamber
item.description: #!/usr/bin/env python3 from pwn import * HOST = "echochamber.deadface.io" # Remote host IP PORT = 13337 # Remote port def conn(): p = remote(HOST, PORT) return p def main(): p = conn() # Establish connection to target p.

item.title: Haunted Library
item.description: #!/usr/bin/env python3 from pwn import * e = ELF("./hauntedlibrary_patched") libc = ELF("./libc.so.6") ld = ELF("./ld-linux-x86-64.so.2") context.binary = e # Set the target binary for pwntools context.

item.title: Locked Out
item.description: #!/usr/bin/env python3 from pwn import * e = ELF("./lockpick_patched") context.binary = e # Set the target binary for pwntools context.terminal = ["kitty", "-e"] # Terminal to use for GDB debugging HOST = "lockpick.
